name: Skin
description: Normal clothing, assumed if other covering is not specified.

name: Robes
description: Full-length robes normally worn by spell users and certain other combatants.

name: Light Hide
description: The natural hide of certain animals (e.g., Deer, Dog, Wolf).

name: Heavy Hide
description: The natural hide of certain of animals (e.g., Buffalo, Elephant, Bear).

name: Leather Jerkin
description: A heavy leather coat without arms and reaching only to the waist or mid-thigh.

name: Leather Coat
description: A heavy leather coat covering the arms and torso to mid-thigh.

name: Reinforced Leather Coat
description: A heavy leather coat covering the arms and torso to mid-thigh, but with either rigid-leather sections or metal sections sewn in for reinforcement.

name: Reinforced Full-Length Leather Coat
description: A reinforced leather coat (as above) that covers to the lower leg.

name: Leather Breastplate
description: A rigid breastplate covering the torso to mid-thigh and part of the upper arms.

name: Leather Breastplate & Greaves
description: As above, but with leather greaves covering the forearms and lower legs.

name: Half-Hide Plate
description: Rigid-leather armor that covers the body completely; includes the hide of creatures that contain at least a few rigid plates (e.g., Rhinoceros, Alligator)

name: Full-Hide Plate
description: As half-hide plate, except that the rigid leather or plates are harder and/or more plentiful (e.g., Turtles, Dragons, Giant Crabs)

name: Chain Shirt
description: A chain mail shirt covering the torso to mid-thigh and half of the upper arms.

name: Chain Shirt & Greaves
description: Chain mail covering most of the body and legs in the form of a shirt and leggings.

name: Full Chain
description: Chain mail covering most of the body and legs in the form of a shirt and leggings.

name: Chain Hauberk
description: A full-length chain mail coat split from the waist in the front and back to facilitate movement.

name: Metal Breastplate
description: A metal breastplate plus smaller plates covering torso to mid-thigh and part of the upper arms.

name: Metal Breastplate & Greaves
description: A metal breastplate plus smaller plates covering torso to mid-thigh and part of the upper arms with greaves on the forearms and lower legs.

name: Half Plate
description: Rigid plate armor covering the body, but with chain mail between the plates, at the joints, and covering the legs.

name: Full Plate
description: Rigid plate armor as half plate, but with plates overlapping at joints, and plate armor covering the legs.
